definition: giving you an advantage or more chance of success; showing that you like or approve of someone or something
a situation in which there is not enough food for a great number of people, causing illness and death, or a particular period when this happens
to make something stronger, especially in order to protect it
the traditional stories and culture of a group of people
to change, especially continuously and between one level or thing and another
happiness, luck, or a condition that produces positive results
